body.content:
Good day

I write to request your cooperation in my desire to find a foreign partner
who will assist me in the relocation and Transfer of US$33,000,000.00 which
is presently available for investment purposes.

I will like you to state firmly any business that is worth investing in
your country will be welcome by me,after looking at the income rate and
also percentage for investing through you.

Please state terms and state of affairs for me and also laws bidding for a
foreigner to invest in your country,i shall let you know the entire plan of
investment as soon as i receive your positive response.

Kind Regards,
Michael Ahkia
